captions.text: Hi, I'm German and I bet you garlic that yesterday was Halloween.
"Disadvantages of being a woman."
Hi!, I'm a entirely different person of who you see every Friday.
In first place, I'm a woman.
We have the same face and voice,
But whatever.
I'm gonna tell you about the Disadvantages of being a woman.
Being a girl is beautiful.
But it also sucks.
For example, when you're on the street and nature calls.
We are not men.
It's not like we can just go and pee on bushes on the street.
We're not dogs.
We NEED a bathroom.
So we enter a mall and go to a public bathroom.
All good.
The only problem is when we start to think.
Right this moment, my butt is touching something that has been touched by hundreds of other butts.
That's when you apply the technique of..
..covering the toilet seat with toilet paper.
And what's with that thing that we HAVE to be feminine.
Men are becoming gayer every day and nobody says anything.
But we still have to be "Ladies"
We have to be delicate even to sneeze.
Like a kitten.
And men can sneeze like bulldogs.
Sadly, we live in a sexist society.
Where men are awesome and women aren't.
Why a I saying this?.
Let's say you went partying for an entire weekend.
This would be a man who tell his friend what happened.
Hey, last weekend was great!.
Awesome!. What did you do?.
I hooked up with like 10 chicks.
Master!.
Amazing!, Idol!.
But if you're a woman.
Girl!, I gotta tell you!.
Tell me!.
I was at a party yesterday and I was with 5 guys!.
Get out of my house! you hoe!!.
Weird.
A guy with many women,
a winner.
A woman with many men,
"Easy, Whore, easier than 1 Times Table."
For example, our appearance.
A man is born hairy, smelling like ass,
doesn't even shower.
And it's alright!.
But we have to go through torture to look good.
Things that men don't have to do.
Or have you never heard a woman say:
"Oh, what a sexy man..
..that manly beard turns me on."
Yes!.
But you've never heard a man say:
"Oh my god, what a sexy woman..
..that hairy armpit turns me on."
The person who said:
"<i>To be beautiful, you have to see stars"</i>
Surely meant the stars you see because of the pain
when you wax your legs.
And later when you are more red than a tomato because of the waxing,
you have to look taller.
So we have to wear shoes with 2 mt. high heels.
That aren't comfortable at all.
See?, I told you that it was a pretty day to go out.
Yeah, yes, so romantic.
Yeah, it's totally romantic to go walking for an entire hour.
"MY FEET!!"
And we have to suck it up.
Because, if we even think of taking them off,
"You know, I'll take my shoes off, my feet are hurting too much."
"Oh, ok, take them off."
"Oh wow, what a relief."
"A HOBBIT!"
Another thing of being a woman, is your friends.
If women are know by something,
it's because of having friends that are..
How to say it.
Let's see.
Bitches.
Those girls that are extremely cynical.
Hi girlfriend!.
Hi, friend!, god you look amazing!.
Thanks!, you look divine!.
I love your nails!.
Thanks!, hey, we should go out one of these days!.
Yes!, we haven't gone out together in a while!.
Ok!, look, I'll call you this weekend.
Yay!.
Yay!, ok divine, see you this weekend!.
Take care!.
I hate that bitch.
Typical Frenemy.
The one that gets the guy that you like.
The one that goes to parties with your same clothes.
Something else that sucks is having your period.
You basically want to kill anyone who talks to you.
You're in pain the entire day.
Damn ovaries!!.
You're extremely sensitive.
Do you have the time?.
You're calling me fat!.
And the worst thing are the mood changes.
You're happy, sad, euphoric,
everything at the same time.
It's horrible!.
Hey look, I bought you tickets to see Justin Direction.
Oh my god, thank you!.
you're so thoughtful!.
It's just a detail.
I'm saying you're thoughtful!!.
But I was just saying.
I'm so excited!.
I'm glad.
I don't even know if I want to go.
I can't wait!.
I miss my dog!.
I'm hungry.
Yaaay!.
Why is life so cruel!!.
Gee, so bipolar.
Your emotions act on their own.
I hate that!.
I love it.
Another disadvantage of being a woman is that we can't trust anyone.
Everyone is a possible rapist.
You take a taxi by yourself alone at night.
The driver can rape you.
You go buy something at that store across the street.
The guy from the store can rape you.
You go to your friend's house,
her brother can rape you.
Everyone can rape you!.
Men don't have that risk.
Hi, what are you doing so lonely here?.
What do you want?.
I want you.
Now!, take your pants off!.
And do things to me.
It doesn't happen.
You never see on the news:
"Last night, a young man was brutally..
raped by 3 women.
And if it were to happen.
Probably that guy would be remembered as a hero by all men.
He would have a statue in a park or something.
Well.
We have to sit in public restrooms.
We have to be feminine.
We are in risk of rape every 10 seconds.
Ok, I can live with that.
But the worst thing of all.
Is having to go through painful waxing,
plug your eyebrows.
Having to go through pain on your feet because of our shoes.
Spend hours putting make up on.
Spend hours and hours in a hair salon.
Just so when we get together with a man they say:
You look like always.
SON OF A-
Question!.
What other disadvantages..
What disadvantages of being a woman can you think of?.
There were many more but I didn't tell them all.
If you have one, leave it in the comments.
Anyway.
This was this week's video, if you liked it please click thumbs up down here.
Next week I had the idea of talking about Grandparents.
Click thumbs up if you like the idea.
If it's the first time you watch one of my videos and you liked it, subscribe!, I upload videos every friday.
Also, don't forget to follow me on Facebook,
And my beautiful and sensual Twitter.
I hope you liked this week's video,
or made you smile once or twice.
Ok, I send you a psychological hug and see you next friday!.
And remember, everything that goes up, has to keep going up.
Bye bye!.
